alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 7:28PM MDT until June 20 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lyon County in southwestern Minnesota... Lincoln County in southwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Pipestone County in southwestern Minnesota... Northeastern Moody County in east central South Dakota... Southeastern Brookings County in east central South Dakota... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elkton, or 14 miles east of Brookings, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Benton around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ivanhoe, Arco and Taunton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
